lead_paragraph: An article on Tuesday about the golfer Padraig Harrington’s preparations for the Masters referred incorrectly to his connection with Rory McIlroy, another golfer in the field. Harrington is from Ireland and McIlroy is from Northern Ireland; they are not countrymen.
